name: Palladium | Advertising & Creative Communications Agency
description: The Palladium Advertising & Creative Communications Agency (PACCA), as a full-service agency, strives to meet not only the primary advertising needs of medium and large companies (including large and medium-sized companies and firms, as well as public and state-owned administrations), but with the help of its audience, aims to provide innovative solutions in the form of digital marketing, content marketing and international market development in the relevant areas.
